alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:41PM CDT until July 21 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Leake County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Attala County in central Mississippi... Western Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smyrna, or 10 miles southeast of Kosciusko, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Renfroe around 750 PM CDT. Edinburg around 820 PM CDT. Pearl River around 840 PM CDT. Philadelphia and Burnside around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Redwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
